resources.string: Reaction not found. Would you like to visit Google?

Solving tasks:
 1. "=" before chemicals, e.g "КОН + H2SO4 =", "HCl + Zn ="
 2. "=" after chemicals, e.g "= NaNO3 + AgCl", "= CuO"
 3. Chemical1 = Chemical2, e.g "Cu + O2 = Cu2O"
 4. Signle chemical sign after "=", e.g "=Ca", "=Fe"
